content:
Here's a video of the Tech Talk I presented last month to my [globaldev team](http://globaldev.co.uk) on the #indieweb and why I believe it's important that you #ownyourdata

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/125167234" width="500" height="281" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
 

Update: [slides are now on SpeakerDeck](https://speakerdeck.com/barryf/why-we-need-the-indieweb):

<script async class="speakerdeck-embed" data-id="3389da67a8d24afbbb34f04428716b95" data-ratio="1.77777777777778" src="//speakerdeck.com/assets/embed.js"></script>
 

My talk and the content is based on and inspired by the work of the [Indieweb community](http://indiewebcamp.com) and is licensed with a [CC0 Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/) licence.
summary: Video of the Tech Talk I presented to my @globaldev team on the #indieweb and why it's important you #ownyourdata https://vimeo.com/globaldev/tech-talk-indieweb
